entries.description: The DynamoDB Enhanced Client now properly sanitizes version attribute names when building conditional expressions for optimistic locking. Version attributes with special characters in their names will now work correctly. See [#3279](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/issues/3279)
This release adds support for the CarrierLookup API, which returns information about a destination phone number including if the number is valid, the carrier, and more.
